Verses: 1 manaase Koththiraththirkum Pangu Kidaiththadhu: Avan Yoseppukku Mudharperaanavan, Manaaseyin Mooththakumaaranum Kileyaaththin Thagappanumaana Maakeer Yuththamanushanaanapadiyinaal, Keeleyaaththum Paasaanum Avanukkuk Kidaiththadhu.

2 abiyesarin Puththirarum, Elekkin Puththirarum, Asriyelin Puththirarum, Sekemin Puththirarum, Epperin Puththirarum, Semeedhaavin Puththirarumaana Manaaseyin Matrakkumaararin Puththiraraagiya Abiyesarin Vamsangalukkuththakka Sudhandharam Kodukkappattadhu. Thangal Vamsangalukkulle Avargale Yoseppudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Manaaseyin Aanpillaigalaayirundhaargal.

3 manaaseyin Kumaaranaagiya Maakeerukkup Pirandha Kileyaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Epperin Magan Seloppiyaaththukkuk Kumaaraththigal Thavira Kumaarar Illai; Avan Kumaaraththigalin Naamangal, Maklaal, Novaal, Oklaal, Milkaal, Thirsaal Enbavaigal.

4 avargal Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaarukkum Noonin Kumaaranaagiya Yosuvaavukkum Prabukkalukkum Munbaaga Serndhuvandhu: Engal Sagodharar Naduve Engalukku Sudhandharam Kodukkumpadi Karththar Mosekkuk Kattalaiyittaar Endraargal; Aagaiyaal Avargal Thagappanudaiya Sagodhararin Naduve, Karththarudaiya Vaakkinpadi, Avargalukku Sudhandharam Koduththaan.
5 yordhaanukku Appuraththile Irukkira Keeleyaadh, Paasaan Ennum Dhesangalaiyallaamal, Manaasekku Seettile Vizhundhadhu Paththup Pangugalaam.
6 manaaseyin Kumaaraththigal Avan Kumaararukkulle Sudhandharam Petraargal; Manaaseyin Matrap Puththirarukkuk Keeleyaa Dhesam Kidaiththadhu.
7 manaaseyin Ellai, Aaser Thodangi Seekemin Munnirukkira Mikmeththaavukkum, Angeyirundhu Valadhupuramaai Endhappuvaavin Kudigalidaththirkum Pogiradhu.
8 thappuvaavin Nilam Manaasekkuk Kidaiththadhu; Manaaseyin Ellaiyodirukkira Thappuvaavo, Eppiraayeem Puththirarin Vamsamaayitru.

9 appuram Andha Ellai Kaanaa Ennum Aatrukkup Poi, Aatrukkuth Therkaaga Irangugiradhu; Manaaseyin Pattanangalin Naduve Irukkira Avvidaththup Pattanangal Eppiraayeemudaiyavaigal; Manaaseyin Ellai Aatrukku Vadakkeyirundhu Samuththiraththukkup Poi Mudiyum.
10 thennaadu Eppiraayeemudaiyadhu; Vadanaadu Manaaseyinudaiyadhu; Samuththiram Adhin Ellai; Adhu Vadakke Aaseraiyum Kizhakke Isakkaaraiyum Thodugiradhu.

11 isakkaarilum Aaserilumirukkira Moondru Naadugalaagiya Pedhseyaanum Adhin Oorgalum, Ipleyaamum Adhin Oorgalum, Thorin Kudigalum Adhin Oorgalum, Endhorin Kudigalum Adhin Oorgalum, Thaanaagin Kudigalum Adhin Oorgalum, Mekidhovin Kudigalum Adhin Oorgalum Manaaseyinudaiyavaigal.
12 manaaseyin Puththirar Andhap Pattanangalin Kudigalaith Thuraththividak Koodaamarpoyitru; Kaanaaniyar Andha Seemaiyiledhaane Kudiyirukkavendumendru Irundhaargal.
13 isravel Puththirar Balaththapodhum Kaanaaniyarai Mutrilum Thuraththividaamal, Avargalaip Pagudhikattugiravargalaakkikkondaargal.

14 yoseppin Puththirar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Karththar Engalai Idhuvaraikkum Aaseervadhiththuvandhadhinaal, Naangal Janamperuththavargalaayirukkirom; Neer Engalukku Sudhandharamaaga Ore Veedhaththaiyum Ore Pangaiyum Koduththadhu Enna Endru Kettaargal.

15 adharku Yosuvaa: Neengal Janamperuththavargalaayum, Eppiraayeem Malaigal Ungalukku Nerukkamaayumirundhaal, Perisiyar Reppaayeemiyar Kudiyirukkira Kaattu Dhesaththukkup Poi Ungalukku Idam Undaakkikkollungal Endraan.

16 adharku Yoseppin Puththirar: Malaigal Engalukkup Podhaadhu; Pallaththaakku Naattilirukkira Pedhseyaanilum, Adhin Oorgalilum, Yesrayel Pallaththaakkilum Kudiyirukkira Ellaak Kaanaaniyaridaththilum Iruppuradhangal Undu Endraargal.

17 yosuvaa Yoseppu Vamsaththaaraagiya Eppiraayeemiyaraiyum Manaaseyaraiyum Nokki: Neengal Janamperuththavargal, Ungalukku Magaa Paraakkiramamum Undu, Oru Pangumaaththiram Alla, Malaiththesamum Ungaludaiyadhaagum.

18 adhu Kaadaanapadiyinaale, Adhai Vettith Thiruththungal, Appozhudhu Adhin Kadaiyaandharamattum Ungaludaiyadhaayirukkum; Kaanaaniyarukku Iruppu Radhangal Irundhaalum, Avargal Palaththavargalaayirundhaalum, Neengal Avargalaith Thuraththividuveergal Endraan.
